key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, including exposure to GDPR and CCPA
Competitive pressures in the fraud prevention market
Fraud detection accuracy issues, including false positives
controversies: Securities class action lawsuit related to its July 2021 IPO, though dismissed with prejudice
social_issues: Commitment to data privacy and fraud prevention aligns with societal goals
governance_issues: Adherence to government sanctions and data privacy laws, but not required to follow PCI-DSS standards
